page.title: 17Transport around Salterton
page.content: The railway line from Budleigh Salterton to Exmouth and Sidmouth was closed by an Act of Parliament in 1967 because the line was losing money.The Station Masters cottage is still lived in by the last station master even though the station is now disused.The cottage was built by J.W.Palmers and it was made from an original plan of a Swiss cottage. Private cars and a bus route now connect Salterton with the nearest station at Exmouth but most people going further afield prefer going by car to Exeter and catch main line trains from there. A private bus company operates from the town and this not only transports schoolchildren to and from Exmouth but also provides an occasional bus service for shoppers direct to Exeter 14 miles away.
